Company: ARMSTRONG-PRIESTLEY LIMITED
Also known as: Armstrong Priestley
Services: Automatic Fire Sprinklers, Fire Suppression Solutions, Fire Sprinkler Servicing, Fire Protection, Fire Engineering Technology, Water Mist, Foam, Fire Extinguishing Systems, Hydrants, Hose Reels, Wet & Dry Riser.
Products: Automatic Fire Sprinkler Systems, Water Mist Systems, Foam Systems, Fire Extinguishing Systems, Hydrants, Hose Reels, Wet Risers, Dry Risers.
Industry: Public Safety, Other construction installation
About: Armstrong Priestley is the UK’s leading independent fire protection contractor, specializing in the design and installation of high-quality automatic fire sprinkler systems. They have been in business for over 45 years, delivering systems on time and on budget across various sectors including Commercial, Education, Residential, and Industrial. They also provide third-party certification, testing, and maintenance services for their installations.
SIC Codes: 43290 - Other construction installation
Location: Leeds, UK
Certifications: LPCB Level 4 Certification (for commercial and industrial fire sprinkler systems), FIRAS Certification (for Residential and Domestic fire sprinkler systems), ISO 9001:2015 certification (for Leeds office)

Industry: Construction, Other specialised construction activities not elsewhere classified. Specialist industries served include Power Generation, Independent Power, Petrochemical, Refineries, Waste to Energy, Nuclear, Manufacturing, Paper & Pulp, Smelting, Listed buildings.
About: Expert Steeplejacks at the cutting edge of safety and innovation, providing unsurpassed quality and safety for projects. They specialize in the maintenance, repair, and inspection of tall structures, including industrial chimneys, and also offer lightning protection systems. They have over 25 years of trading experience with an expanding portfolio of blue-chip clients globally.

text:
Company: CHELMSFORD COUNCIL FOR VOLUNTARY SERVICE
Also known as: Chelmsford CVS, CHELMSFORD 4 GOOD
Services: Support and development for local charities, voluntary and community groups. Hosts projects including: Chelmsford Volunteering Centre, Chelmsford 4 Good, Chelmsford Men's Shed, Writtle Garden, Tennyson Live Well Garden, SWF Community Garden, South Woodham Ferrers Community Hub, Seated Yoga, Computer Club with IT Man, Ukrainians in Chelmsford, Caffe Marconi Knitting Group, Community Corner, Chelmsford 100, Number 11, The Meadows, Pre-Loved Prom, SWOT, Live Well Link Well Connect Well, Winter Warm, My Weight Matters, Holiday Hamper.
Industry: Activities of other membership organisations not elsewhere classified, Economic/community Development/employment
About: An independent support and development organisation set up to champion, support and strengthen local charities, voluntary and community groups. It works to support, promote, and develop local voluntary action to improve the effectiveness of voluntary and community organisations in Chelmsford, Essex. The organisation believes that voluntary and community action is essential for vibrant and caring local communities. It offers specialist information and support, spreads good practice, encourages joint working, helps groups find funding, encourages local people to get involved, works with partners to develop projects, promotes equality and diversity, helps public bodies engage with local voluntary organisations, and ensures policy makers understand the needs of local voluntary organisations and community groups. It works locally and in collaboration with other partners across Essex, Southend and Thurrock to maximise voluntary and community action, develop strong communities and enhance local wellbeing.
SIC Codes: 94990
Location: Chelmsford, UK
Certifications: NAVCA member

metadata.services: Support and development for local charities, voluntary and community groups. Hosts projects including: Chelmsford Volunteering Centre, Chelmsford 4 Good, Chelmsford Men's Shed, Writtle Garden, Tennyson Live Well Garden, SWF Community Garden, South Woodham Ferrers Community Hub, Seated Yoga, Computer Club with IT Man, Ukrainians in Chelmsford, Caffe Marconi Knitting Group, Community Corner, Chelmsford 100, Number 11, The Meadows, Pre-Loved Prom, SWOT, Live Well Link Well Connect Well, Winter Warm, My Weight Matters, Holiday Hamper.
metadata.industry: Activities of other membership organisations not elsewhere classified, Economic/community Development/employment
metadata.about: An independent support and development organisation set up to champion, support and strengthen local charities, voluntary and community groups. It works to support, promote, and develop local voluntary action to improve the effectiveness of voluntary and community organisations in Chelmsford, Essex. The organisation believes that voluntary and community action is essential for vibrant and caring local communities. It offers specialist information and support, spreads good practice, encourages joint working, helps groups find funding, encourages local people to get involved, works with partners to develop projects, promotes equality and diversity, helps public bodies engage with local voluntary organisations, and ensures policy makers understand the needs of local voluntary organisations and community groups. It works locally and in collaboration with other partners across Essex, Southend and Thurrock to maximise voluntary and community action, develop strong communities and enhance local wellbeing.

text:
Company: BOOTH DISPENSERS LIMITED
Also known as: Booth Dispensers Ltd.
Services: Manufacturing and supplying dispense equipment, Supplying to the soft drink industry, Supplying to the brewery industry, Delivering reliable and cost-effective solutions, Researching and developing new product lines, Fabrication of high-calibre products.
Products: Cooler and Dispense equipment, Essential bar products and accessories, Refrigeration equipment, Vending equipment, Blu Cooler, Talia-A2120, Vesi-A2120.
Industry: Food & Beverages, Manufacture of other special-purpose machinery n.e.c.
About: Booth Dispensers Limited is an independent UK cooler and dispense manufacturer established in 1965, incorporated in 1999. They manufacture and supply equipment to the trade, specifically the soft drink industry, bars, and breweries across the UK and worldwide. The company focuses on providing top-notch service, offering an exhaustive inventory of essential bar products and accessories, backed by refrigeration and vending expertise. They deliver reliable, cost-effective solutions and are committed to continuous innovation, researching, developing, and bringing new lines to market annually. Their Blackpool-based manufacturing facility hand-assembles around 30,000 units a year, operating to optimal conditions for high-calibre product fabrication.
SIC Codes: 28990 - Manufacture of other special-purpose machinery not elsewhere classified
Location: Blackpool, United Kingdom

text:
Company: FURY DESIGN AGENCY LIMITED
Also known as: FURY DESIGN AGENCY LTD
Services: Design Services
Industry: Management consultancy activities other than financial management
About: From design to implementation, we deliver captivating brand experiences. We believe design innovation only comes from breaking down barriers between creative disciplines. Approaching each project with fresh energy, to transform cutting-edge concepts into breathtaking reality is what drives us. Our multidisciplinary design team challenges each brief, to create compelling stories and content that excites audiences, delights sponsors and makes your brand message approachable, attractive and fun. With this passion for creating, combined with extensive industry insight, we help our clients to develop effective strategies that deliver the best possible return on investment. No matter where in the world you’re heading, our team will be with you each step of the way. Every detail matters to us and, we’ve earned a reputation for creating unforgettable experiences in spaces that people love. We design, we create, we deliver!
SIC Codes: 70229
Location: London, United Kingdom

Also known as: Kent Foods
Services: Wholesale, distribution, export
Products: Sugars, sweeteners, dairy products, oils, fats, food ingredients, cake mix
Industry: Food and drink, Wholesale, Retail and luxury
About: Kent Foods is a supplier of sugars, sweeteners, dairy products, oils, and fats to the food manufacturing industry. They stock and supply a wide range of related ingredients, sourcing direct from growers and manufacturers. They have over twenty five years of experience in sourcing and supplying key ingredients to their customers. Their global working knowledge and connections enable them to source direct from growers and manufacturers. They export to EU countries, Middle East, Russia and CIS countries, Hong Kong, Japan and Taiwan.

Company: BASINGSTOKE AND DEANE CANOE CLUB
Also known as: Basingstoke & Deane Canoe Club, BADCC
Services: Kayaking, Open Canoeing, Stand Up Paddling (SUP), Coaching & Leadership, Safeguarding, Health & Safety, Courses, Club Sessions, Taster Days, Pool Programs, White Water Trips, Sea Kayak Trips, SUP Trips, Membership, Equipment Charges, bespoke taster sessions for youth groups and voluntary organisations.
Industry: Sports Activities, Other sports activities, Paddlesports
About: Basingstoke & Deane Canoe Club (BADCC) is a charity run by volunteers, affiliated with British Canoeing. It provides safe paddlesport activities including recreational kayaking, open canoeing, and SUP (Stand Up Paddling). They offer activities for disabled young people, including those with physical disabilities and wheelchair users, with specialist coaches. The club aims to provide kayaking and canoeing activities to people who would not otherwise be able to participate in paddlesports, assisting with independence and better physical and mental wellbeing.
SIC Codes: 93199
Location: Basingstoke, England
Certifications: Affiliated to British Canoeing

Products: Beer (Lager, Cider, Low Alcohol, Ghost Ship Fleet, Mini Kegs, Southwold Bitter, Wild Wave Cider, Bitburger, seasonal beers), Wine (Red, White, Rosé, Sparkling, Low & No, Adnams Selection, Private Cellar), Spirits (Gin, Vodka, Whisky, Cask Whisky, Mixers, Other Spirits, Copper House Dry Gin, Longshore Vodka, Single Malt Whisky, Spirit of Broadside, Rye Malt Whiskey, Smidgin Dry Gin), Accessories & Clothing (Beer Merchandise, Barware, Food, Clothing, Homeware, Gift Vouchers, Glassware).
Industry: Beverages Manufacturing, Alcoholic Drinks, Food, Drink And Tobacco.
About: Adnams PLC is a Public Limited Company, incorporated on 24 March 1890, with a history spanning over 150 years. It is primarily involved in the distilling, rectifying and blending of spirits, manufacture of beer, and the wholesale and retail sale of wine, beer, spirits and other alcoholic beverages. The company also operates pubs and hotels, offers various tours and experiences, and provides cellar and contract services. Adnams employs 556 people and is engaged in community and sustainability initiatives.
SIC Codes: 11010 - Distilling, rectifying and blending of spirits; 11050 - Manufacture of beer; 46342 - Wholesale of wine, beer, spirits and other alcoholic beverages; 47250 - Retail sale of beverages in specialised stores.

metadata.about: Adnams PLC is a Public Limited Company, incorporated on 24 March 1890, with a history spanning over 150 years. It is primarily involved in the distilling, rectifying and blending of spirits, manufacture of beer, and the wholesale and retail sale of wine, beer, spirits and other alcoholic beverages. The company also operates pubs and hotels, offers various tours and experiences, and provides cellar and contract services. Adnams employs 556 people and is engaged in community and sustainability initiatives.
metadata.address: East Green, Southwold, Suffolk, IP18 6JW

text:
Company: AFFINITY WATER LIMITED
Also known as: Affinity Water
Services: Water collection, treatment and supply; Account management (moving home, updating details, bill copies, priority services, feedback); Billing (online bills, understanding bills, paperless billing); Payment services (payment plans, financial support, reduced bills, bill cap scheme, waste water charges help); Emergency response (incident alerts, no water, low pressure, works search, mains renewal, customer support during incidents, Home Emergency Cover); Problem reporting (water leaks, low water pressure); Water advice (drinking water quality, water hardness, plumber finder, wastewater provider, how-to guides, stop tap location, lead pipes); Metering (application, reading, submission, programme); Water saving (tips, devices, footprint, garden saving, home visits, rewards, school programs, water neutrality); Building & Developing support (home projects, connection applications, lead pipe replacement, joint supply separation, disconnections, temporary supplies, mains connections/diversions, self-lay guidance, NAVs); Charges information; Retailer & Business services (charges, accredited entities, payment terms, credit support, meter reading, account management, trade sewerage & drainage, hydrant licence, policies, water quality, water fittings regulations, water efficiency visits).
Industry: Water collection, treatment and supply
About: Affinity Water Limited is an active private limited company incorporated in 1990. It is a large water supplier in the UK, providing water collection, treatment, and supply services to over 3.9 million customers. The company also offers comprehensive account management, billing, payment plans, financial support, emergency response, water advice, metering services, and initiatives for water saving. They also cater to homeowners, builders, developers, and business retailers.
SIC Codes: 36000
Location: Hatfield, UK
Certifications: Mentions "Accreditation & certification" on their website, but no specific certifications are listed in the provided content.

Company: BELLROCK PROPERTY & FACILITIES MANAGEMENT LIMITED
Also known as: Bellrock, Concerto Support, Concerto, Bellrock Group
Services: Property and facilities management, workplace management solutions, CAFM software, property asset management, project management, asset management software solutions, business and domestic software development, management of real estate on a fee or contract basis.
Products: Concerto (mobile-enabled property asset management system with CAFM software capability), Bellrock (SaaS-driven computer-aided facility management software).
Industry: Property & Facilities Management, Software Development, Real Estate Management, Workplace Management.
About: Bellrock Property & Facilities Management Limited is an active private limited company specializing in technology-enabled workplace management solutions, property and facilities management services. It provides SaaS-driven computer-aided facility management (CAFM) software for commercial spaces and mobile-enabled property asset management systems. The company also engages in business and domestic software development and the management of real estate on a fee or contract basis.
SIC Codes: 62012 - Business and domestic software development, 68320 - Management of real estate on a fee or contract basis

text:
Company: BASILDON DISTRICT COUNCIL
Also known as: BASILDON BOROUGH COUNCIL, Basildon Council
Services: Animal control, Building Control, Council tax and benefits, Environmental Health, Housing services, Information Access Request, Safeguarding, Street scene services, Parking, Planning, Waste and recycling, Councillors and Committee, Leisure activities (25 in 25 Programme, Laindon Community Centre, George Hurd Centre, Activity Centres for over 50s, Events and activities, Halls for hire, Sports Facilities, Allotments, Countryside, The Place), Business support (Basildon for business, Procurement, Business Events, Business rates, Licensing and regulation, Health and safety at work, Food safety services, The Good Employer Charter Scheme, The Basildon First Charter, Commercial property, Commercial waste and recycling, Business support and growth), Council operations (Fraud & Corruption, How Basildon Borough Council works, Councillors and Council Meetings, Voting, elections and referendums, Plans, performance and policies, Annual Governance Statement, Council finances, Data and information, Public notices, Insurance policies and claims, Inclusion and diversity, Basildon Borough Youth Council), Food Hygiene inspections.
Industry: Local Government / Public Administration
About: A local authority (council) responsible for providing a wide range of public services to residents and businesses in the Basildon borough. It operates under a Royal Charter and is governed by local authority legislation. Services include council tax, housing, environmental health, waste and recycling, planning, leisure facilities, business support, and more. It also conducts food hygiene inspections for premises within its jurisdiction.
SIC Codes: None Supplied
Location: Basildon, United Kingdom
